title: New free champion rotation: Ekko, Jinx, Lee Sin and more!

replies.body:
"Now this is the story all about how
Your life got flipped, turned up-side down
And I'd like to take a moment let me explain
I'll tell you how I became the prince of the rift's bottom lane"

of course its riven free week, i can smell the menstruation in the air already

could you please make champions that are barely played in the rotation such as poppy and zilean? Because sometimes you decide to play a random champ and it ends up getting you a favourite champion to play.
